title: The New Rules (Ep 1457)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the tactics we MUST adapt to defeat the radical left. I also address the disastrous new policies being pushed by the hapless Biden administration.

News Picks:


Cancel culture hits a fever pitch as tyrannical liberals smell blood in the water.


Here’s what the Democrats were really hiding by changing their minds on impeachment witnesses.

President Trump’s impeachment attorney absolutely destroys the media in this clip.


Ted Cruz asks impeachment managers if Kamala Harris incited a riot. 

Why corporations continue to surrender to the radical left.

The defund the police fiasco fully collapses.

Biden pushes a radical firearms confiscation measure.
